videos.description: Romeo Langford uses sweet pick-and-roll to set up a Juwan Morgan slam.

videos.headline: Morgan jams home dunk after nice pick-and-roll

videos.description: Ryan Cline scoops up an errant pass off Matt Haarms' head and scores the easy layup.
videos.headline: Ball bounces of Haarms head, leads to layup

videos.description: Juwan Morgan leaps and pins Carsen Edward's layup with an emphatic block.
videos.headline: Morgan swats Edwards' layup

videos.description: Carsen Edwards' rough night continues as he misses a dunk off the iron.
videos.headline: Edwards clanks dunk attempt
